name: Kawaii Pet to Kurasou! Wan Nyan & Idol Animal
storyline:
Features 20 kinds of animals! - You can choose from 3 types of color for each pet.

Increase your level and achieve high rank - Take a cute picture of pets and post them to the in-game SNS and increase the number of followers. By doing so, you can achieve additional pets under your care and the variation of items such as interior and toys that you can buy will increase as well.

Play with your pets - You can call them by their name, teach them some tricks or have them play with toys. If you keep multiple pet (maximum of 3) in a room, you'll discover cute gestures and enjoy being their owner!

Facilities - Enjoy new facilities such as the park, pet hotel and welfare facilities!

Accessories - As you advance the game, you will be able to get new items (interior, toys) that makes rooms and gardens more beautiful for your pets.
summary: Kawaii Pet to Kurasou! Wan Nyan & Idol Animal lets you choose an adorable virtual pet to adopt, train, wash, love, feed and entertain. You'll have hours of furry fun playing your pet's breed, unique personality, fur and eye color and the accessories it will wear while you play.
